data.message:
I love you so much Em.
Thanks for existing.
And I believe God Himself decided to take a trip to earth and took birth as Marshal Mathers.
You are a lifesaver.
You're an inspiration.
You're my everything.
Thanks
Love you 💓
Stan Forever

replies.message: Eminem doesn't like . but it's ok whatever u say.

He loves his fans.
I love him too.

Yes he does.
God loves everyone 😝

Yes he does ;)
Eminem doesn't hate haters.
God didn't create Em, his mother & father did the work. If God created us, he must've had a lot of pussy in his life.
reply Harley Reid. lmao u will be burned. lol
I used the word 'God' as a metaphor every time I mentioned him.

And yeah
Speaking of getting burned, 
First of all, Eminem wasn't created on purpose by his mother and father, he was an accident, and as you can see an accident that turned out to be a god himself, and again sir, God as in not the almighty, but a perfectionist and unbeatable in his field.
And thank God, the almighty, that he was born.

Accidents arent always accidents. He's a good artist. Somebody has to swear on a microphone and give people an outlet where they can sing along and if somebody says "why are you swearing so much" they can be like "oh just rapping some eminem"... I cant think of anybody better for the job.
Wow! Jai Hind! To Maharajah Mathers..
Shußham Thé Gaŋdhi ..You have the gray matter ..keep it up..

Assuming that it wasn't a sarcastic​ comment or an insult, but it was rather a compliment,
Thank you so much Sophia Pde

And Maharaja Mathers was a good one 😂
I was born a mistake but i was not put here by accident...
I was born a mistake but i was not put here by accident...
